tasks.title: Feature: Date Navigator for Temporal Mobility Data (Issue #1)
tasks.description: Add date navigation controls to filter mobility data by specific date, allowing users to review historical assessments and interventions.
tasks.details: Implement date navigator between header and table with Previous/Today/Next controls. Format: 'Monday, December 14, 2025'. Server-side CCL filtering with date parameter (midnight to 23:59:59). Files: index.html, styles.css, main.js, PatientListService.js, mob_get_pdata_01.prg (NEW), XMLCclRequestSimulator.js
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI display, backward/forward navigation, Today button, CCL date parameter, mock data with different dates

subtasks.title: Add date navigator HTML and CSS
subtasks.description: Add date navigator div between header and main. Include Previous/Today/Next buttons, date display span. Add CSS styling for buttons.

subtasks.title: Add date state management to main.js
subtasks.description: Add selectedDate and isToday to app state. Create setSelectedDate(), formatDateDisplay(), updateDateDisplay(), updateDateNavButtons() functions.

subtasks.title: Add date navigation event handlers
subtasks.description: Wire up Previous button (subtract 1 day), Today button (jump to current), Next button (add 1 day). Create reloadCurrentData() function.

subtasks.title: ðŸ›‘ VALIDATION: Test date navigator UI in browser
subtasks.description: Verify date navigator displays correctly, buttons work, date format correct, Today indicator shows. STOP and get approval before proceeding to CCL.

subtasks.title: Create mobility CCL program with date filtering
subtasks.description: Create 1_cust_mp_mob_get_pdata_01.prg from gen_get_pdata.prg. Add SELECTED_DATE parameter, date range logic (midnight to 23:59:59), mobility data queries.

subtasks.title: Update services to pass date parameter to CCL
subtasks.description: Modify PatientListService.js to call mob_get_pdata_01 with date parameter. Format date for CCL. Handle CURDATE default for today.

subtasks.title: Add date-aware mock data to simulator
subtasks.description: Create getMockMobilityData() in XMLCclRequestSimulator. Generate different data based on date parameter. Test date navigation with mock data.

subtasks.title: ðŸ›‘ VALIDATION: Test complete date navigation flow
subtasks.description: Test all scenarios: initial load (today), backward navigation, Today button, forward navigation. Verify data changes per date. STOP and get approval.

subtasks.title: Update documentation
subtasks.description: Update README.md with date navigator feature. Update CHANGELOG.md with v1.1.0 entry. Document date filtering approach.

subtasks.title: ðŸ›‘ VALIDATION: Create Pull Request for code review
subtasks.description: Create PR with description, reference Issue #1. Show code changes for review. STOP and wait for PR approval before merging.
